Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the only goal in the 30th minute, securing a 1-0 victory for Brazil.
Pre-Game Insights: Brazil were in sixth place in the South American qualifying standings before the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Brazil moved up to fourth place in the South American qualifying standings with 10 points from seven games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Brazil struggled to create clear-cut scoring chances despite dominating possession for long periods.
